para: This option is closely related to the 'category' option. While category allows you to choose a single category that waypoints should appear in, this options allows you to specify a bitmask to be used for the category. Options may be specified in either decimal or hex.

example.title: Example for gdb bitcategory option to put all waypoints in categories 1 and 16.
example.para:
The following two commands are equivalent. They place a the point in both the first and last of the sixteen available categories.
gpsbabel -i gpx -f PocketQuery.gpx -o gdb,bitscategory=32769 -F foo.gdb
gpsbabel -i gpx -f PocketQuery.gpx -o gdb,bitscategory=0x8001 -F foo.gdb
